mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO notice_tb ( region, type, is_mer_dynamic, title, img_address, content, status, create_date, update_date, account_id, business_id ) VALUES ( #{region}, #{type}, #{isMerDynamic}, #{title}, #{imgAddress}, #{content}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{accountId}, #{businessId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE notice_tb
region=#{region},
type=#{type},
is_mer_dynamic=#{isMerDynamic},
title=#{title},
img_address=#{imgAddress},
content=#{content},
status=#{status},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate},
account_id=#{accountId},
business_id=#{businessId},
WHERE notice_id=#{noticeId}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, region, type, is_mer_dynamic, title, img_address, content, status, create_date, update_date, account_id, business_id FROM notice_tb WHERE notice_id=#{noticeId}
